title: LF Diamond players who want to win weekly tournaments
body:
Hi Summoners,

I am looking for players who are interested in competing on tournaments weekly and try to win RP.
The tournaments will take place from 18 - 20 CET and take approximately 3 to 4 hours.

The first tournament we will play on will be tomorrow, if I find a team in time.

What am I searching ?
I dont look for any unexperienced player who plays a bunch of roles decent. I look for players who main their role, who are good, who have some main champs and who are willing not to blame teammates, rather carry their own lane.
Confident players with an aggression playstyle and skilled in fast paced games.

Requirements:
Language: English
Current Rank: Diamond 5+
Experience: Main in a primary Role

Roles needed:
TOP: open
JUNGLER: open
MID: found
ADC: open
SUPPORT: found

Regards
aschmitoren
